description: Throughout this playthrough, you'll have to keep track of two systems when using /d/Greate/d/ machines:

1. /d/Overstressed/d/: The default /d/Create/d/ system, you'll have to keep the amount of /d/Stress Units/d/ consumed by machines __equal to__ or __under__ the amount of stress you __generate__ on the network. If you go __over__, everything on the network will stop.

2. /d/Overcapacity/d/: A system exclusive to Greate machines, which works in a similar way to how /d/Overstressed/d/ works. With this system, you'll have to keep the amount of stress generated on the network __equal to__ or __under__ the amount of stress a machine can support. You can see this by looking at the machine's tooltip:
Regardless of the systems, you'll see a message on any Create/Greate machine if they are overstressed/overcapacity by looking at them.
